Bridging Borders Building Futures
Elevating the Practice of Immigration Law with Expertise in Corporate & Securities.
Get in Touch
The Origin Law Advantage
Our primary mission is to guide globally-focused individuals and businesses through the complexities of life and business in the United States. Drawing from our extensive experience with clients from across the globe, we understand the distinctive challenges that foreign nationals face. Immigration forms the cornerstone of their future in the U.S., prompting us to dedicate unwavering time and attention to understanding the full scope of options and implications under U.S. immigration laws. However, for those with investment or entrepreneurial ambitions, immigration is often just one pivotal step, not the final destination. An "immigration-only" approach can overlook broader business implications, potentially hindering the achievement of overarching goals. Our proficiency in corporate and securities law equips our clients to navigate these intricate intersections, offering a comprehensive toolkit for every step of their journey.
origin n.The point or place where something begins, arises, or is derived.
Peter Zhang
Managing Attorney
While immigration law is of critical importance to foreign nationals, it should not be practiced in a vacuum—especially when many immigration strategies intrinsically rely on elements of business and finance. Our integrated approach help clients achieve a wider range of objectives and tackle more complicated problems. The very nature of this vision requires a highly intricate and personalized approach to representation.
There is no ‘one size-fits-all’ at Origin Law.
Meet Our Team
Empowering Businesses and
Entrepreneurs
At every stage of the business cycle, we empower entrepreneurs and companies to reach their operational and growth ambitions. Our firm boasts a deep understanding of private placement securities offerings, including those linked to the EB-5 immigration program. We are at the forefront of capital market innovations, adept at navigating online investment platforms, digital securities, and online capital raising. With our specialization in immigration law, we are the go-to partners for U.S. businesses and project developers with a global vision for operations and capital sourcing.
Capital Raising
